tmap.mapgl 0.1
  • Reference
  • Two new modes, mapbox and maplibre

Package index

mapgl

tmap.mapgl tmap.mapgl-package
Extension for tmap: maps are shown via mapbox.gl

Set mode specific options

tm_mapbox()
Mapbox mode options
tm_maplibre()
Maplibre mode options

Polygons in 3d

tm_polygons_3d() opt_tm_polygons_3d()
Map layer: polygons in 3d (experimental)
